resources.string: Control exercised using the accelerometer. By controlling the bite, which is located at the bottom of the screen, you need to beat off ball and break them blocks. At each level given a certain number of lives. In the upper band of the screen displays the parameters of the current game: the number of remaining lives, the time that has elapsed since the beginning of the level, the number of points earned for completing the level. Levels are traversed sequentially from first to last. At the beginning of the game is only available the first level. Passage of the current level opens the next, and so to last. If you prefer, you can choose your favorite levels again.
